quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), the Appointments Committee of the Cabinet (ACC) has approved the appointment of _________, as the Chairperson of Competition Commission of India (CCI).
options: Arvind Kumar
A K Mohanty
Praveen Sood
Anil Kumar Jain
Ravneet Kaur

quiz.text: As per recent (May 2023) news, Amy Pope of USA has been elected as the 1st Woman Director General of which of the following organizations?
options: International Civil Aviation Organization
World Trade Organization
International Organization for Migration
Food and Agriculture Organization
International Atomic Energy Agency

quiz.text: Which of the following companies/organizations have partnered to launch the 1st commercial space station Haven-1 by 2025?
options: Vast and SpaceX
ISRO and SpaceX
Roscosmos and ISRO
Dhruva Space and ISRO
SpaceX and NASA

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), the term ‘Nakba’ has been in news. ‘Nakba’ means ‘Catastrophe’ in Arabic. It refers to the mass displacement and exodus of __________ that occurred in 1948.
options: Sudanese
Egyptians
Pakistanis
Saudis
Palestinians

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), departing from Pune to New Delhi, AirAsia India flight i5- 767, a part of the Tata group and a subsidiary of Air India, used a Sustainable Aviation Fuel (SAF) blend that was supplied by ____________.
options: Indian Oil Corporation Ltd. (IOCL)
Praj Industries Ltd.
Oil India Limited (OIL)
1 and 2
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: As per recent (May 2023) news, University Grants Commission (UGC) has launched two brand-new, user-friendly portals titled PoP and UTSAH (Undertaking Transformative Strategies and Actions in Higher Education). What is the full form of ‘PoP’?
options: Professor of Performance
Professor of Priority
Priority of Practice
Performance of Professors
Professor of Practice

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), Online rural education initiative ‘Pahal’ has been developed by which of the following entities?
options: Department of Secondary Education, Uttarakhand
Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Kanpur
Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delhi
IIT Patna
IIT Roorkee

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), Asia Petrochemical Industry Conference (APIC) 2023 has been held in New Delhi. The APIC was established in 1979 and which was not one of the founding countries?
options: Japan
South Korea
Taiwan
India
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), Wings India 2024, expected to be Asia's largest event on Civil Aviation on Commercial, General and Business Aviation will be held in which of the following places?
options: Hyderabad, Telangana
Kochi, Kerala
Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh
Raipur, Chhattisgarh
Cuttack, Odisha

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), Zomato has inked pact with ________ to launch its own UPI.
options: IndusInd Bank
IDFC First Bank
Axis Bank
ICICI Bank
State Bank of India

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), the Reserve Bank has given its approval to SBI Funds Management (SBIFML) to acquire up to 9.99 per cent stake in __________, the private sector lender.
options: ICICI Bank
Yes Bank
Axis Bank
HDFC Bank
IndusInd Bank

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), Central Government and which of the following state governments has/have signed an MoU for a ‘Riverine Based Religious Tourism Circuit’?
options: Assam
Uttar Pradesh
Gujarat
Madhya Pradesh
Odisha

quiz.text: As per recent (May 2023) news, the first India - EU Trade and Technology Council (TTC) meeting has been held in ____________.
options: Berlin, Germany
Delhi, India
Brussels, Belgium
Paris, France
Geneva, Switzerland

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Madras has signed a Letter of Intent (LoI) with which of the following countries to build a ‘Center of Water Technology’ (CoWT) in Water Resources Management and Water Technologies?
options: Australia
Israel
Germany
Japan
Norway

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), ___________ has granted Rs 51 crore to set up Integrated Road Safety Enforcement System in Shimla, Nurpur.
options: Asian Development Bank
NHAI
Ministry of Road Transport and Highways
World Bank
Border Roads Organization

quiz.text: As per recent (May 2023) news, Gajraj Corps of the Indian Army has conducted a Joint Flood Relief 'Exercise Jal Rahat' on __________ to validate joint drills and coordinate preparedness by multi-agency flood relief columns.
options: Brahmaputra River, Assam
Manas River, Assam
Kosi River, Bihar
Mahanadi River, Odisha
Ganga River, West Bengal

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), Naval version of ‘Lanza-N 3D’ has been installed on one of the Indian Navy’s Destroyer Ship by which of the following companies?
options: Indra Sistemas, S.A, Madrid
TATA Advanced Systems Limited (TASL)
Bharat Electronics Limited (BEL)
Bharat Dynamics Limited (BDL)
1 and 2

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), on behalf of the Late Naresh Kumar, his granddaughter, Shivanie Mirchandani has received her grandfather's 2020 Dronacharya award. Naresh Kumar was associated with which of the following sports?
options: Shooting
Hockey
Football
Tennis
Badminton

quiz.text: As per recent (May 2023) news, who has been given the France's highest civilian award Chevalier de la Legion d'honneur for his contributions to strengthen the trade relationship between India and France?
options: N. Chandrasekaran
Ratan Tata
Piyush Goyal
Narendra Modi
Anand Mahindra

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), who among the following has been appointed as chairman of Petroleum & Natural Gas Regulatory Board (PNGRB)?
options: Anil Kumar Jain
Dinesh Kumar Sarraf
Bhavesh Gupta
Pramod Bhasin
Rajendra S Pawar

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), India & _________ have launched a ‘50 start-ups exchange programme’.
options: Nepal
Singapore
UAE
Bangladesh
Sri Lanka

quiz.text: As per recent (May 2023) news, India's defence production has risen more than 12% last fiscal year (FY23) and crossed the ______________ threshold for the first time.
options: 50 thousand crore rupee
5 lakh crore rupee
1 lakh crore rupee
2 lakh crore rupee
10 lakh crore rupee

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), India launched ‘Operation Karuna’ to assist _________ which has been devastated by Cyclone Mocha.
options: Indonesia
Yemen
Iran
Bangladesh
Myanmar

quiz.text: Union Home Minister and Minister of Cooperation Shri Amit Shah has laid the foundation stone of the permanent campus of ____________ at Dwarka, Gujarat, to be built at a cost of Rs. 470 crore.
options: National Academy of Coastal Policing (NACP)
National Academy of Construction (NAC)
National Academy of Indian Railways (NAIR)
National Academy of Cyber Security (NACS)
National Academy of Police Research (NAPR)

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), Saturn has regained its crown as the planet with the most moons in the solar system. The leap-frog comes after the discovery of ________ new moons of Saturn, bringing its official total to 145.
options: 34
87
62
46
54

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), 2nd edition of Exercise ‘AL-Mohed AL-Hindi 2023’ has been held between navies of India and _________.
options: Oman
Saudi Arabia
UAE
Iran
Egypt

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), sixth Scorpene Submarine of Project 75 ‘Vaghsheer’ (Yard 11880), which has been developed by ____________, has commenced its sea trials.
options: Garden Reach Shipbuilders and Engineers Limited
Mazagon Dock Shipbuilders Limited
Goa Shipyard Limited

None of the above

options: Garden Reach Shipbuilders and Engineers Limited

L&T

options: Papua New Guinea

Japan
Vietnam

options: Amitabh Bachan

options: Port Moresby

quiz.text: Which of the following is the theme for World Metrology Day 2023 that was observed on 20th May?
options: Metrology in the Digital Era
